text: Ruillé-le-Gravelais is a former commune of 619 people (1999). It is in the Pays de la Loire region in the Mayenne department in northwest France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Loiron-Ruillé.Arrêté préfectoral 18 November 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Mayenne
title: Ruillé-le-Gravelais
